home.title: Adhara | Spa, Massages and Beauty in Palma de Mallorca
home.description: Reserved for you, an exclusive moment of Relaxation, Beauty, and Wellness. Discover our facial treatments, massages, and aesthetics.

contact.title: Contact and Appointments | Adhara Beauty & Wellness
contact.description: Find us at Calle Villalonga, 33 in Palma. Call or write to book your next appointment. Check our schedule and social media.

facial-treatments.title: Premium Facial Treatments in Palma | Adhara Beauty
facial-treatments.description: Discover deep facial cleansing, vitamins, radiofrequency, Dermapen, and Hifu. Revitalized skin guaranteed in Palma de Mallorca.

eye-aesthetics.title: Eye Aesthetics and Lash Services | Adhara Beauty
eye-aesthetics.description: Specialized services including brow and lash tinting, lash lifting, and lash extensions for a more expressive look.

makeup.title: Professional Makeup for Events and Weddings | Palma
makeup.description: We offer professional makeup services adapted for every event, weddings, and special occasions in Mallorca.

hand-care.title: Manicure and Hand Care in Palma | Adhara
hand-care.description: Embellish and care for your hands and nails with a professional manicure and permanent polish for perfect nails longer.

hair-removal.title: Laser, Wax, and Electric Hair Removal | Adhara Mallorca
hair-removal.description: Hair removal services with cold/hot wax, electric hair removal, and diode laser for long-lasting results.

spa-massages.title: Relaxing Massages and Spa in Mallorca | Adhara Beauty
spa-massages.description: Relaxing, sports, lymphatic drainage, and exclusive Adhara massage. Plus, body exfoliation to renew your skin.

body-treatments.title: Body Treatments and Aesthetics in Palma | Adhara
body-treatments.description: Diathermy, Radiofrequency, Vacuotherapy, Mesotherapy, Pressotherapy, and body Hifu for firmness and localized fat reduction.

foot-care.title: Pedicure and Foot Care in Palma | Permanent Polish
foot-care.description: Embellish and care for your feet with professional pedicure and permanent polish. Perfect and healthy feet!
